content: this simple crochet tote hangs effortlessly chic adding a stylish touch to your look stitched in caron simply soft the bag is made from 2 folded triangles with different striping patterns for maximum visual impact practice single_crochet simple increases mattress stitch and more we provide 3 versions to explore but you can express your personality by using any color combination that suits your tastes materials caron® simply soft™ 6 oz/170 g 315 yds/288 m version 1 contrast a bone 9703 1 ball contrast b autumn maize 0008 1 ball contrast c taupe 9783 1 ball measurements approx 14½ 37 cm tall x 9 23 cm wide x 2 5 cm deep excluding straps
